text: Miguel Ângelo Silva Mota Faria (born 20 March 1995) simply Miguel Ângelo, is a Portuguese footballer who plays for Freamunde as a forward. ==Football career== On 23 May 2015, Miguel Ângelo made his professional debut with Leixões in a 2014–15 Segunda Liga match against Portimonense. ==References== ==External links== *Stats and profile at Zerozero * *Stats and profile at LPFP * Category:1995 births Category:Sportspeople from Porto Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:LigaPro players Category:Leixões S.C. players Category:S.C. Freamunde players
title: Miguel Ângelo Faria
